title: Opinion: My grandfather created the hepatitis B vaccine. Would he recognize public health in the U.S. today?
description: Physician Emilie G.C. Thompson’s grandfather created the hepatitis B vaccine. Now she’s watching his legacy get dismantled.
content: Physician Emilie G.C. Thompson’s grandfather created the hepatitis B vaccine. Now she’s watching his legacy get dismantled.
